Your social position in the house was very important before that comp. Still waiting for Rachel fans to admit she royally flopped, since we all witnessed her performance, and that they 1 moeopoly 10/06/25 04:53 PM You seem to fail to understand --- NO COMP HAS EVER BEFORE MEANT INSTANT EXPULSION NT Mikentosh 10/13/25 12:22 PM Think you missed MY point. NT moeopoly 10/15/25 08:03 AM Your point does not address the complaint that no one has ever been kicked out of the house without a vote. No one thinks Rachel did well on the wheel. And no one should ever be eliminated by AZ_Cards_11 10/17/25 05:14 AM if it didn't address it then why are we talking about it? Because that's the only thing people want to harp on, and it's just because it was Rachel. They harped on other things until they were moeopoly 10/17/25 08:37 AM Ok. Producers should just eliminate the vote and every week just bounce the person that can't complete a competition. FYI, I'm not a Rachel fan, look at my signature. NT AZ_Cards_11 10/17/25 10:09 AM You didn't read the article, did you? The whole point is that the "voting" and "social" aspect came before the comp, rather than after.
